page.title: 04P.C. Parkin 1.
page.content: P.C. George Parkin is a local bobby. He lives in the area and is well known to many of the children at our school. Not because he has had to arrest them but because he is a friendly policeman. He came to our school recently to tell us about his job. He told us to call him George and said he had been a policeman for 20 years, thirteen of them in Morecambe. He enjoys his work and although it is sometimes dangerous he wouldn't want to have a different job because it is in the main interesting work. George works different shifts and on the day he came to see us he had started work at ten past five in the morning. Policemen must always be smart and at 5.30 they were inspected before going out on patrol. They must also catch up with what happened the previous day.
